error.communication: Unable to connect to OpenEVSE charger. Please check the log for details.

user.description:
Please enter the connection information of OpenEVSE charger.
You can also enter your grid import/export and solar production sensors to push data to OpenEVSE.

IMPORTANT NOTE: OpenEVSE expects negative import and positive export.
user.title: OpenEVSE Setup
